name: Illini Gym
desc: iOS app for real-time gym occupancy monitoring, achieving 2,000+ users in 2 weeks. Built using React Native and Firebase.

name: MindMint
desc: Educational app with AI-driven learning and teacher platform, awarded for NFT integration. Built using React Native and Firebase.

name: NQL: SQL Chatbot
desc: Advanced chatbot for effortless data retrieval through natural language interactions. Built using React and Java.

name: Code For Good
desc: App for dismantling child trafficking networks with monitoring and educational resources. Built using React Native and Firebase.

name: OranjBot
desc: Chatbot providing instant support for developer inquiries, streamlining workflows. Built using HTML/CSS and Python.
